markdownRemark.html:
Check it out here:

https://devchat.tv/elixir-mix/emx-068-contributing-to-the-elixir-community-with-david-bernheisel-cory-schmitt/

Cory and I talk about our adventures in the Elixir community, Meetup.com, and how we’ve contributed. The big contribution in here is the DateTimeParser that we built.

frontmatter.title: Ecto Tips: UUID Boilerplate, Docs, and Composing Changesets
frontmatter.excerpt:
There are some helpful techniques you can employ to help you and your
coworkers when writing long changeset functions. It's hard to remember what's
required, optional, and defaulted. DB-generated UUIDs. And composing
changesets.
